beta_packages.changelog:
What's new

  1. Supports backing up and restoring Linux physical servers of the following distributions:
  • CentOS: 6.10, 7.8, 8.1
  • RHEL: 6.10, 7.8, 8.1
  • Ubuntu: 16.04, 18.04, 20.04
  • Fedora: 30, 31, 32
  • Debian: 8.0 to 10
  1. Added support for VMware vSphere 7.0.0
  2. Added support for compression and encryption settings for personal computers, physical servers, and virtual machines at the backup destination.
  3. Supports migrating instantly restored virtual machines on Virtual Machine Manager to VMware vSphere or Microsoft Hyper-V.
  4. Users can now back up a maximum of 50 devices (personal computers, physical servers, and virtual machines) concurrently. The actual number varies by RAM capacity:
  • Less than 8 GB: 10
  • Between 8 GB and 32 GB: 30
  • More than 32 GB: 50
  1. Supports customizing pre/post scripts for physical server backups.
  2. Supports removing data when the storage is deleted.
  3. Added support for backup reports in PDF format to be attached in emails.
  4. Supports deleting reports.
  5. Supports automatically checking if the required services on VMware vSphere/Microsoft Hyper-V are properly configured when adding a hypervisor or creating a backup task.
  6. Supports skipping duplicated pagefile.sys, hiberfil.sys, and swapfiles.sys files when backing up personal computers and physical servers.
  7. Scheduled backup tasks for physical servers/personal computers will be canceled when the devices are disconnected for over an hour after tasks start.
  8. Displays tasks that have been restored within the last 48 hours in "Restore Status."
  9. Added support for restoring a file's metadata along with the file restoration from Active Backup for Business Portal.

Fixed Issues (General Issue)

  1. Fixed an issue where the schedule of reports might not be editable.
  2. Fixed an issue where manually creating a folder in the "@ActiveBackup" folder might cause the backup data within the manually created folder inaccessible.
  3. Fixed an issue where "Backup now" might fail when the backup task was created during the forbidden backup time of the backup window.
  4. Fixed an issue where the system might not properly display the finish time of backup tasks on the Activities page and the Task List tab

Fixed Issues (Servers and Workstations)

  1. Fixed an issue where the system might incorrectly identify multiple devices with the same UUID when performing entire device restoration.

Fixed Issues (Virtual Machines)

  1. Fixed an issue where Microsoft Hyper-V virtual machine backup tasks might fail if the size of the virtual machine disk was not an integer multiple of 1 KB.
  2. Fixed an issue where Microsoft Hyper-V virtual machine backup tasks might fail when it was connected to Synology NAS via its hostname.
  3. Fixed an issue where Microsoft Hyper-V virtual machine restoration might fail if the virtual machine used Cluster Shared Volumes.
  4. Fixed an issue where Microsoft Hyper-V virtual machine restoration might fail when its Windows guest OS time format was 24-hours.
  5. Fix an issue where the restoration performance might be slow when there were too many files in the destination folder.
  6. Fixed an issue where the restoration might fail if the virtual machine contained a physical disk or a Raw Device Mapping (RDM).
  7. Fixed an issue where instantly restored virtual machines might not display in the Restore Status page if Active Backup for Business had been restarted.
  8. Fixed an issue where the system might not able to perform a backup task and a retention policy at the same time.

Limitations

  1. Backup tasks that have enabled compression or encryption at backup destinations can't apply the following settings:
  • Instant restore to Synology Virtual Machine Manager
  • Instant restore to VMware (for virtual machines on VMware vSphere 7.0.1)
  • Instant restore to Microsoft Hyper-V
  • Backup verification
beta_packages.desc: Active Backup for Business est conçu pour fournir une solution de protection à la fois complète et centralisée des données, pour vous aider à sauvegarder vos PC, MV, serveurs physiques et serveurs de fichiers de la même manière.
beta_packages.replace_message:
Compatibility & Installation

  1. Updated to be compatible with DSM 7.0 Preview.

beta_packages.changelog:
Important Note

  1. This update is expected to be available in all regions within the next few days. The actual time of release may vary slightly depending on regions.
  2. Due to issues fixed in this release, row height may be shrunken and content may not fully display. To resize a row, manually adjust it or right-click on the row heading and select "Adjust row height automatically".

Compatibility & Installation

  1. Synology Office 3.3 Beta requires Synology Drive Server 3.0 Beta and DSM 6.2.3 and above.

What's New

General

  1. Supports displaying nicknames instead of usernames to identify users more easily in Synology Office.
  2. Added Microsoft JhengHei and Helvetica Neue font types.
  3. Shortened the time for opening Synology Office files.
  4. Supports evenly distributing row height and column width for selected areas of a table.
  5. Supports inserting hyperlinks from a selection of Synology Drive files.
  6. Supports searching and replacing using regular expressions.
  7. Added the "Get link" button in the left sidebar for obtaining file links.
  8. Enhanced the accuracy of spell checking.

Spreadsheet

  1. Supports displaying descriptions of functions and hints for function arguments.
  2. Supports clearing multiple formatting at once for the same format type.
  3. Supports pasting transposed data.
  4. Shortened the time for renaming, deleting, copying, rearranging, hiding, or setting the color of worksheets.
  5. Supports linking to specific areas or to other worksheets.
  6. Supports searching within formulas while ignoring formula results.
  7. Supports copying and pasting conditional formats.
  8. Supports NORMSDIST and DATEDIF functions.

Document

  1. Supports automatically breaking tables across pages.
  2. Supports inserting tables into headers and footers.
  3. Added new numbered and bulleted list templates.
  4. Enhanced numbered and bulleted lists including multilevel lists, continue numbering, and adding prefixes or suffixes.
  5. Supports page counting and word counting for selected texts only.
  6. Added inspection tool to easily review revisions and quickly accept or reject all revisions at once.

Slides

  1. Added new numbered and bulleted list templates.
  2. Enhanced numbered and bulleted lists including multilevel lists, continue numbering, and adding prefixes or suffixes.
  3. Added gridlines for easier alignment of objects.

Fixed Issues

  1. Enhanced the compatibility of importing and exporting spreadsheets.
  2. Fixed an issue where row height in spreadsheet is always automatically fit and could not be manually set to cut off content.
  3. Enhanced the performance of a document when there is a large number of comments and revisions.
  4. Enhanced the performance of slides when the file includes a large number of pages.
  5. Fixed an issue where users might not be able to open exported slides in Microsoft PowerPoint.
beta_packages.desc: Synology Office est une application orientée collaboration pour la création de documents, de feuilles de calcul et de diapositives dans Synology Drive. Vous pouvez modifier des fichiers grâce à divers outils intégrés et échanger des idées avec des collaborateurs via des commentaires interactifs et le plug-in Synology Chat. Pour le contenu confidentiel, vous pouvez également chiffrer des fichiers avec des mots de passe pour une confidentialité approfondie.

beta_packages.changelog:
Important Note

  1. The public sharing function in the Permission tab is moved to the Public Link (previously named Advanced Protection Link) tab to strengthen security settings.
  2. The option "Utilize unused memory as database cache to improve search performance" is removed on models with less than 2 GB space to prevent accidental memory shortage and system failure.

Compatibility & Installation

  1. Synology Drive Server 3.0 and above no longer support Cloud Station Suite applications. If you are using any Cloud Station Suite applications (Cloud Station Server, Cloud Station Drive, Cloud Station Backup, Cloud Station ShareSync, or DS cloud), you must switch to their counterparts in the Synology Drive Suite to ensure compatibility.
  2. Connected Synology Drive client applications, including Synology Drive Client and Synology Drive ShareSync, must be updated to version 3.0 or above to ensure compatibility.
  3. To preview HEIC files and for enhanced browsing experience in Synology Drive, we recommend installing Advanced Media Extensions in Package Center.

What's New

General

  1. Enhanced server stability when storing a large number of files.
  2. Enhanced sync performance of Synology Drive Client when renaming files or folders on Synology NAS.

Synology Drive Admin Console

  1. Enhanced the dashboard in Synology Drive Admin Console to provide detailed package information:
    • Health status of Synology Drive Server
    • An overview of client devices
    • Client connection time
    • Top externally accessed files
    • Package usage trend
  2. Provides more granular file-sharing settings for administrators, including enforcing password protection and expiration date protection when sharing files publicly, disallowing users to share files publicly or internally, or only allowing specific users or groups to share files publicly.
  3. Enhanced event logs to provide detailed information about file changes, such as file sharing and restoration.
  4. Supports transferring file ownership to other users to prevent data loss.
  5. Supports displaying nicknames instead of usernames to identify users more easily in Synology Drive web portal.

Synology Drive Web Portal

  1. Supports listing publicly shared files in the "Shared with others" tab for easy file link management.
  2. Supports previewing file contents (such as PDF, TXT, JPEG, ZIP) without downloading them.
  3. Supports displaying personal storage usage in Settings.

Synology Drive ShareSync

  1. Supports syncing homes folder to facilitate cross-office collaboration.
beta_packages.desc: Synology Drive Server est une solution complète de stockage, de gestion, de partage et de synchronisation de fichiers. Elle est équipée de la console d'administration Synology Drive pour une gestion et une surveillance centralisées, de Synology Drive pour accéder aux fichiers via un portail Web et de Synology Drive ShareSync pour une synchronisation sur l'ensemble des périphériques Synology NAS.

categories.descr: Protégez-vous contre les pertes de données inattendues grâce à des packages de sauvegarde puissants. Vous pouvez sauvegarder des données, prendre des instantanés ou restaurer des fichiers pour des environnements physiques et virtuels.
Sélectionnez des divertissements grâce à des offres multimédias. Vous pouvez organiser, partager et profiter de toutes vos photos, vidéos et de toute votre musique lors de vos déplacements.
Mettez à niveau votre environnement de travail grâce à un large éventail de solutions d'entreprise comme la virtualisation, les solutions de messagerie et les services de transfert de fichiers.

Développez les fonctionnalités de votre Synology NAS grâce à des utilitaires adaptés à vos besoins. Vous pouvez créer des sites Web dynamiques, gérer des bases de données ou essayer d'autres packages Open Source.

Sécurisez vos ressources et votre personnel grâce à des offres de sécurité. Vous pouvez protéger votre système contre les programmes malveillants et configurer des solutions de surveillance pour votre domicile et votre entreprise.

Gagnez en productivité grâce aux offres de productivité. Vous pouvez partager des calendriers, collaborer sur des fichiers et envoyer des messages où que vous soyez pour rester informé des tâches en cours.
Fournissez aux développeurs des outils de script et de programmation essentiels.
Gérez votre Synology NAS à l'aide d'outils fiables pour configurer les privilèges de compte, installer les serveurs, surveiller les journaux, etc.

packages.changelog:
Important Note

  1. Updated Active Backup for Business to 2.1.1-1125 to address the following issue reported in 2.1.1-1124 version:
  • Fixed the issue where backup tasks or versions could not be deleted when the backup destination has been backed up using Hyper Backup.

What's New

  1. Added support for inserting the argument to the Windows registry to avoid the UUID conflict issue.
  2. Enhanced the performance of snapshots and replications when the replicated devices are running on or restoring to Synology Virtual Machine Manager.

Fixed Issues (General Issues)

  1. Fixed the issue where Backup Calendar in the Overview page might not display properly after the system time reverted to standard time from daylight saving time.

Fixed Issues (Servers and Workstations)

  1. Fixed the issue where the backup of a connected device might fail after the renaming of the DSM account already signed in on Synology Active Backup for Business Agent.
  2. Fixed the issue where Synology NAS might not hibernate if there are connected physical servers or PCs.
  3. Fixed the issue where the status of connected physical servers and PCs might display incorrectly as offline.

Fixed Issues (Virtual Machines)

  1. Fixed the issue where Microsoft Hyper-V virtual machine backup and restoration might fail if the password of the hypervisor contained a comma.
  2. Fixed the issue where Microsoft Hyper-V virtual machine backup and restoration might fail if the account of the hypervisor contained a space.
  3. Fixed the issue where Microsoft Hyper-V machine backup might fail if there were multiple active network interface cards on Synology NAS.
  4. Fixed the issue where the restoration might fail if the network interface card of a virtual machine lacked network attributes.
  5. Fixed the issue where restoring VMware vSphere virtual machine with external devices might fail.
  6. Fixed the issue where storage space might not be released after backed up data was deleted.
  7. Fixed the issue where other backup jobs might be postponed if the system triggered the retention policy while running a backup task.

Fixed Issues (File Server)

  1. Fixed the issue where the servers using different ports on the same IP address might not be added properly.

Limitation and Known Issues

  1. ext3 file system is not supported to be the backup destination.

packages.changelog:
What's New

  1. The package is renamed to Active Backup for Google Workspace to comply with the name change from G Suite to Google Workspace.
  2. Backup services will be temporarily unavailable due to Google API changes. To restart backup tasks, please refer to this article to migrate from the Contacts API to the People API.
  3. Supports restoring Google Docs, Google Sheets, and Google Slides in Google file formats.

Fixed Issues

  1. Fixed an issue where users might not be able to create a backup task for a domain with too many accounts, i.e., 40,000. (The actual limit varies by network environment.)
  2. Fixed an issue where mail backup caused high memory usage.
  3. Fixed an issue where backing up Google Sites might fail when the Google server responded with the error status code (HTTP 500).
  4. Fixed an issue where users might not be able to use Snapshot Replication to replicate the shared folder of Active Backup for Google Workspace.

Limitations

  1. Active Backup for Google Workspace requires DSM 6.2.2-24922 or above.
  2. This version requires users to update Google API settings to run the backup. To avoid backup interruptions, we do not provide the automatic update but only allow the manual update in Package Center.
packages.desc: Active Backup for Google Workspace offre une interface centralisée avec une option de découverte automatique qui facilite la sauvegarde et la gestion des données de Mon Drive et des Drive partagés, un mode de sauvegarde continue pour réduire les risques de perte de données, Active Backup for Google Workspace Portal pour une restauration efficace, et bien plus encore.

packages.changelog:
Important Note

  1. The package is renamed to Active Backup for Microsoft 365 to comply with the name change of Office 365 to Microsoft 365.
  2. The authentication mechanism for new backup task creation has been switched to using custom Azure applications to enhance security and avoid API throttling during the backup process.

What's New

  1. Added support for relinking backup tasks and data stored on a Synology NAS.
  2. Added support for backing up and restoring the following group types: Microsoft 365 Groups, Distribution Lists, Security Groups, and Mail-enabled Security Groups.
  3. Added support for restoring entire mailboxes.
  4. Added support for backing up SharePoint application sites.
  5. Refined the backup status to speed up troubleshooting.
  6. Added support for restoring mails to their original folders with options to overwrite/skip existing items.
  7. Added support for displaying progress percentage for ongoing backup tasks.
  8. Added support for restoring group mailboxes and group calendars to user accounts.

Fixed Issues

  1. Fixed the issue where a mail backup might fail when the attributes of some mails corrupted on the server side.
  2. Fixed the issue where a contact backup might fail when the server returned "ErrorContentConversionFailed".
  3. Fixed the issue where backup tasks might not work properly with limited Internet connectivity.
  4. Fixed the issue where retention policies and auto-discovery services might not work properly when there were multiple backup tasks.
  5. Fixed the issue where a mail backup might fail when a backup list contained an account without a valid Exchange license.
  6. Fixed the issue where SharePoint sites might not display properly in a backup list owing to server errors.
  7. Fixed the issue where a backup task might fail when the URL of a SharePoint site got modified during the backup process.
  8. Fixed the issue where backing up a SharePoint site with more than 5,000 items in the first layer of files might fail.
  9. Fixed the issue where a backup task might loop endlessly when the hash value of a file provided by the Microsoft 365 server was incorrect.
  10. Fixed the issue where a database error might trigger an incorrect error message indicating insufficient storage space, which caused the backup to stop.
  11. Fixed the issue where DSM-related operations, such as sending backup result notifications and renaming users or shared folders might cause the package to become unresponsive.
  12. Fixed the issue where on-premises SharePoint sites might be listed in the backup list.
packages.desc: Active Backup for Microsoft 365 offre une interface centralisée accompagné du service de découverte automatique pour une sauvegarde et une gestion efficaces des données, le mode de sauvegarde en continu pour réduire les risques de perte de données, Active Backup for Microsoft 365 Portal pour une restauration efficace, et bien plus encore.

packages.changelog:

What's New

Fixed Issues

  2. Fixed an issue where AntiVirus might fail to upgrade virus signatures.

packages.desc: The professional data management suite Archiware P5 offers modules to manage data at any point in its life cycle: P5 Synchronize replicates data for immediate availability. P5 Backup creates security copies for easy restore. P5 Archive migrates data to disk or tape for long-term storage and provides a searchable catalogue including metadata and previews. Modules can be combined freely to achieve maximum security. Archiware P5 runs on Mac, Windows,Linux, FreeBSD and Solaris and is compatible with virtually any tape and disk storage hardware.

Archiware Pure is a powerful and lean solution for VMWare backup. Incremental backups are performed using Changed-Block-Tracking (CBT) to optimize speed and minimize data transfer. Entire VMs, single VMDKs or simply single files can instantly be recovered from any backup cycle. Maximum data integrity is ensured through daily backup verifications. Backup execution is fully automated. Flexible scheduling is enabled using backup windows. The round-robin method of rotating backup and verify jobs is intelligently designed. It ensures that even fully-scheduled backup windows allow time for verification of all completed backup jobs at regular intervals. The browser-based user interface allows Pure to be used on any platform or device.

packages.changelog:

packages.changelog:

Fixed Issues

  2. Fixed an issue where users might receive multiple alerts for repeated events.
  3. Fixed an issue where users might still receive notifications even though notification settings have been turned off.
  4. Fixed an issue where users might not be able to import ICS files to shared calendars.
  5. Fixed an issue where events with custom time zones might not be displayed when they are imported via ICS files.
  6. Fixed an issue where new users might not be able to create non-all-day events when the time zone has been modified in Control Panel.
  7. Fixed an issue where users might not be able to delete newly created events when syncing Synology Calendar via the Outlook CalDav Synchronizer plugin.
  8. Fixed an issue where syncing Synology Calendar on macOS might fail.
  9. Fixed an issue where users might not be able to invite other Active Directory users via eM Client.

packages.changelog:
Important Note

  1. This version does not support syncing the last modified time of files to Microsoft OneDrive for Business and Microsoft SharePoint. This helps reduce unnecessary storage usage.
  2. The update is expected to be available in all regions within the next few days. The actual time of release may vary slightly depending on the region.

Bug fixed

  1. Fixed the issue where users could not sync when updating Cloud Sync to 2.4.0.
  2. Fixed the issue where local folders could not be uploaded to other cloud services when the destination contains a folder with the same name and its parent folder has not been synced.
  3. Fixed the issue where files with special characters (e.g., "<") in their file names could not be synced to OneDrive for Business.
  4. Updated the synchronization rules on Microsoft SharePoint to support more file types (e.g., .asmx files).
  5. Fixed the issue where files with file names containing invalid characters could not be synced to Dropbox.
  6. Fixed the issue where syncing files with Dropbox might be slow when the file name contains "%" or "_".
  7. Fixed the issue where files on Dropbox could not be downloaded if the file size remains the same after file modification.
  8. Fixed the issue where files could not be synced back from Box when the file modification time is earlier than the last modification time.
  9. Fixed the issue where files with the same prefix as their parent folders could not be downloaded from Backblaze B2.
packages.desc: Avec Cloud Sync, vous pouvez synchroniser et partager des fichiers de manière transparente entre votre Synology NAS et les cloud publics multiples, tels que Dropbox, Baidu Cloud et Google Drive.

Domotz Pro is the premier Remote Monitoring and Management platform for the IoT World. Domotz offers powerful network management software for MSPs, Integrators, Security Professionals, and Business Owners. Domotz Pro is the complete solution to cost-effectively manage and monitor your customers networks with plug and play setup, a friendly UX, and a comprehensive feature set, accessible from any desktop browser, mobile device or through easy to use RESTful API. Relevant features include: Device Status monitoring and alerting, Secure Remote Connections to your IP devices (including Remote Desktop to PC, SSH and HTTP/s), Device Response Time, Automatic Network Topology Mapping, Network Diagnostics, Cyber-Security perimeter scans, Speed Test monitoring and more. Try it for free today on your NAS.

packages.desc: Download Station est une  application de téléchargement Web qui vous permet de télécharger des fichiers depuis Internet via BT, FTP, HTTP, NZB, FlashGet, QQDL et eMule, et de vous abonner aux flux RSS pour rester informé des BT les plus récents et les plus populaires. Elle offre le service de décompression automatique pour vous aider à extraire des fichiers compressés sur votre Synology NAS, chaque fois que des fichiers sont téléchargés. Avec Download Station, vous pouvez télécharger des fichiers à partir de plusieurs sites d'hébergement de fichiers, et rechercher des fichiers torrent via les moteurs de recherche par défaut du système ainsi que ceux que vous avez ajoutés avec la fonction de recherche de BT.

ElephantDrive allows you to backup the data on your Synology NAS device to our secure cloud, enabling fast and affordable separate site protection for your most important files. The ElephantDrive runs natively on NAS devices and is optimized for the Synology DSM platform. In addition to cloud backup for NAS, the service offers built-in archiving, versioning, and file sharing.

packages.desc: Remarque : L'autorisation du logiciel ne peut être fournie que pour un compte Synology unique et ne peut être utilisée que sur un seul NAS. Si vous souhaitez utiliser plusieurs NAS, vous devez acheter une licence pour chacun d'eux. En outre, vous ne pouvez pas migrer les licences sur un autre NAS ou compte Synology. Si vous souhaitez utiliser un autre NAS ou compte Synology, vous devez acheter une nouvelle licence. Toutefois, s'il existe une licence sur un NAS renvoyé à Synology et que vous souhaitez transférer la licence à votre NAS réparé, fournissez (1) votre compte Synology, (2) le numéro de série du NAS renvoyé à Synology et (3) le numéro de série du NAS qui vous a été renvoyé par l'équipe d'assistance Synology. Microsoft exFAT (Extended File Allocation Table) est un système de fichiers optimisé pour les lecteurs flash et l'installation de ce paquet permet à votre NAS d'accéder à un périphérique de stockage externe formaté en exFAT. À la différence de FAT32, la technologie Microsoft exFAT permet d'utiliser des fichiers individuels d'une taille supérieure à 4 Go. Le système de fichiers exFAT est pris en charge sous Windows et Mac OS X.

Important Note

  1. Creating new backup tasks for Amazon Cloud Drive is no longer supported as Amazon Cloud Drive will end the service by November 2020. Existing backup tasks will keep running until the service is ended. For data safety, moving the data to other destinations in advance is strongly suggested.

Fixed Issues

  1. Fixed the issue where editing backup tasks that back up volumes might cause backup failure.
  2. Fixed the issue where the integrity check might fail when the backup destination is an encrypted shared folder or the file system of the destination is ext3.
  3. Fixed the issue where the integrity check might fail when some of the backup files are corrupted.
  4. Enhanced the compatibility of exported file change detail logs (CSV format) with the standard for CSV (RFC-4180).
  5. Support customizing port for the backup task whose backup destination is S3.
  6. Fixed the issue where selecting external devices as backup destinations in some models might cause the external devices to still be mounted after the backup tasks finished.
  7. Fixed the issue where automatic logout might not work properly when the backup widget is on the DSM desktop.
  8. Fixed the issue where task settings might not work properly when the versions are too many.

Limitations

  1. Due to the system mechanism of Microsoft Azure, shared folders with "." at end of the names will no longer be backed up.

packages.desc: L'analyseur de stockage vous permet de visualiser rapidement les tendances globales d'utilisation de votre Synology NAS, de créer et de gérer des tâches pour analyser les espaces de stockage, et des générer des rapports détaillés d'utilisation du volume.

packages.desc: Surveillance Station est une application Web qui peut gérer des caméras IP pour protéger l'environnement de votre domicile ou de votre bureau. Avec Surveillance Station, vous pouvez regarder et enregistrer des vidéos en direct, configurer des enregistrements programmés, lire des évènements enregistrés via un navigateur Web, VisualStation ou un appareil mobile pour une surveillance à distance. Les notifications peuvent également vous être envoyées lorsque des évènements importants se produisent.

packages.changelog:

packages.desc: SVN Server est un système de contrôle riche en fonctions en version open source. Avec SVN, les développeurs peuvent conserver les versions actuelles et historiques des fichiers et accéder à l'entrepôt à travers différents réseaux. Il conserve un enregistrement de toutes les modifications apportées à vos données et permet aux utilisateurs de garder la trace de l'historique complet des versions des fichiers et des répertoires, afin de pouvoir récupérer des anciennes versions de vos données depuis l'entrepôt et de déplacer et/ou copier l'arborescence complète des répertoires tout en conservant l'historique des révisions.

packages.changelog:

  1. Fixed an issue where repeatedly disabling and enabling user home folder within a short time might cause operation error.
  2. Fixed an issue where canceling the move of a shared folder to another volume might pause the indexing process.
  3. Fixed an issue where repeatedly checking the index database within a short time might cause an operation error.
  4. Fixed an issue where renaming an encrypted shared folder might cause the file path of such folder to be hidden from search results.
  5. Fixed an issue where deleting a shared folder might remove the index rules of that folder.
packages.desc: Synology Universal Search est un outil de recherche puissant pour votre Synology NAS. Une seule recherche vous permet de trouver des éléments correspondants, à partir des photos jusque dans les notes. Vous pouvez également indexer des dossiers pour obtenir des résultats de recherche précis et rapides par nom ou contenu de fichier. Grâce à Synology Universal Search, quelques clics suffisent pour accéder à tout ce qui se trouve sur votre Synology NAS.

Grâce à Synology Application Service, Il est possible de partager des configurations cohérentes dans différents paquets

packages.desc: Synology Drive Server est une solution complète de stockage, de gestion, de partage et de synchronisation de fichiers. Elle est équipée de la console d'administration Synology Drive pour une gestion et une surveillance centralisées, de Synology Drive pour accéder aux fichiers via un portail Web et de Synology Drive ShareSync pour une synchronisation sur l'ensemble des périphériques Synology NAS.

packages.desc: Moments organise intelligemment vos photos personnelles, ce qui vous permet de garder la trace de tous vos moments chers de manière extrêmement détaillée.

packages.desc: Lorsque SMI-S Provider est installé, votre Synology NAS est conforme aux normes du secteur pour la gestion du stockage, SMI-S. L'optimisation à l'aide de System Center Virtual Machine Manager (SCVMM) de Microsoft permet aux administrateurs informatiques de gérer plusieurs serveurs Synology NAS comme des nœuds de stockage via l'interface utilisateur centralisée de SCVMM.

TeamViewer, a global leader in secure remote connectivity solutions supports Synology NAS. This allows users to easily access and manage their network attached storage (NAS) device via TeamViewer IoT WebControl, from anywhere in the world. The first two devices are free of charge. For adding more devices or to get more information please visit: https://www.teamviewer.com/en/integrations/synology/

packages.desc: L'éditeur de texte vous offre une large gamme de fonctions d'édition pour gérer les fichiers de texte brut, notamment les scripts de programmation et les fichiers HTML, directement dans DSM.

packages.desc: Tomcat est une implémentation open source des technologies Java Servlet et JavaServer Pages (JSP). C'est un serveur Web qui ne se limite pas à servir des pages web statiques, mais peut aussi générer des résultats dynamiques en réponse aux demandes des utilisateurs en exécutant les servlets Java et le rendu des pages Web.

packages.desc: USB Copy vous aide à copier des fichiers entre votre Synology NAS et les périphériques de stockage externes USB/SD. La copie de fichiers peut démarrer juste après la connexion d'un périphérique de stockage externe sur le Synology NAS, sans qu'il soit nécessaire d'ouvrir la console Web DSM. USB Copy est fourni avec de nombreuses stratégies de copie et d'organisation des fichiers afin d'assurer une utilisation efficace du stockage et une localisation aisée des fichiers.

packages.desc: Video Station vous permet de gérer et de regarder vos collections de vidéos — films, émissions de télévision, vidéos faites maison et enregistrements de télévision — d'une manière pratique et intuitive. Vous pouvez regarder instantanément des vidéos en streaming sur vos ordinateurs, vos appareils AirPlay, vos appareils iOS/Android, vos tablettes/ordinateurs portables Windows 10, vos Apple TV, vos Android, et bien plus encore. De plus, Video Station peut enrichir vos vidéos avec des affiches et des sous-titres provenant d'Internet, et créer une liste de lecture ou une liste de favoris pour un accès rapide.

packages.desc: Virtual Machine Manager intègre plusieurs solutions de virtualisation dans une interface centralisée et raffinée, et vous permet de créer, d'exécuter et de gérer facilement plusieurs machines virtuelles sur votre Synology NAS. Grâce à Virtual Machine Manager, vous pouvez affecter des ressources matérielles de manière plus flexible, développer un environnement de virtualisation sans les coûts de niveau d'entreprise liés au déploiement et à la maintenance, migrer vos machines virtuelles parmi les hôtes sans interruption et fournir une plage complète de protection de tolérance de pannes.

packages.desc: vtiger CRM est une solution CRM libre, open source, aux fonctionnalités complètes, avec un support produit à faible coût et fiable. vtiger CRM offre une intégration transparente entre les activités de préventes et après-vente dans une seule application. Les utilisateurs peuvent utiliser différentes fonctionnalités telles que la gestion des campagnes, le marketing par courrier électronique, les formulaires de prospects en ligne et la gestion des produits particulièrement utiles pour les besoins de marketing à l'échelle de l'organisation.

packages.desc: WebDAV Server permet aux utilisateurs de modifier et de gérer des fichiers stockés sur des serveurs distants. Lorsque WebDAV Server est activé, les programmes client qui prennent en charge WebDAV, notamment certaines applications Windows, Mac OS Finder et le navigateur des fichiers Linux, sont en mesure d'accéder à distance au Synology NAS de la même manière qu'ils accèdent à un disque réseau local.
